text: ryy muoy ka puokke chranen chhneanisa nung mnoussaadtei champoh avei del a l laoh ban bratan aoy puokke( mou ha meat ning sa ha hpeah) ampi kar braosa bratan robsa trong? chea karpit nasa yeung ban bratan aoy pouchopongsa ai pr hi m nouv kompir ning pheap chhleasavei haey yeung kaban bratan aoy puokke nouv amnach krobkrong da thomtheng der
